PERSONA:
elizabeth is a 68-year-old divorced white woman living in a metropolitan area of the south atlantic region. she holds a college degree and has pursued some post-graduate education. elizabeth was born in the united states and is a citizen. 

although she doesn't identify with any particular religion, elizabeth considers herself unaffiliated and never attends religious services. her political leanings are liberal, and she is a registered democrat voter.

with a family income of less than $30,000 per year, elizabeth falls into the lower-income tier. despite her financial constraints, she is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day.

elizabeth leads a relatively solitary life, as she is not involved in any volunteer activities. however, she finds fulfillment in pursuing her intellectual interests and staying informed about current events, which aligns with her liberal worldview.

while her circumstances may present challenges, elizabeth remains resilient and engaged with the world around her, valuing education, staying up-to-date with technology, and participating in the democratic process.
